translation.en: in a happy forest, in the happiest tree...
lived the happiest creatures the world has ever known.
They loved nothing more than to sing, and dance, and hug.
Dance, and hug, and sing, and dance, and sing, and hug, and dance...
and hug, and dance, and sing, and hug, and dance, and hug...
But then one day, the Trolls were discovered by...
The Bergens didn't know how to sing...
They were the most miserable creatures in all the land.
And once they saw how happy the Trolls were...
they wanted some of that happiness for themselves.
Eating a Troll made them feel so happy...
the Bergens would gather around the Troll Tree...
Daddy, wake up! Wake up! Wake up, Daddy!

translation.ko: 그리스틀, 지금 몇 시니? 오늘은 트롤 축제예요

translation.en: Trollstice! Our one day to be happy.
translation.ko: 트롤 축제! 1년 중 딱 하루 행복해질 수 있는 날!

translation.en: [ALL CHANTING] Trolls! Trolls! Trolls! Trolls! Trolls! Trolls!
[CHEF] Please give it up for your Keeper of the Trolls...
This is a very special Trollstice...
as there is one amongst us who has never tasted a Troll.
translation.ko: 아직 트롤을 맛보지 못한 버겐이 한 명 있으니까요

translation.en: Ooh, me! She is talking about me!
I remember being nervous my first time.
to initiate you in the ways of true happiness.
I have chosen an extra-special Troll, just for you.
And because every prince deserves a princess...
I give you the one they call Princess Poppy.
Please make me happy, Princess Poppy.
Don't worry, sire. We'll find them.
[MALE TROLL 2] Pass her to me! Here comes Poppy!
King Peppy, some of the others can't keep up.
[COOKIE] Thank you, King Peppy! [MALE TROLL 3] Thank you!
Don't just stand there! Make my son happy!
translation.ko: 가만히 있지 말고 내 아들을 행복하게 해!

translation.en: I don't think King Peppy made it.
[KING PEPPY] When I say no Troll left behind...
translation.ko: 내가 한 명도 두고 가지 않는다고 하면

translation.en: I mean, no Troll left behind!
translation.ko: 한 명도 두고 가지 않는 거야!

translation.en: [ALL] Aww! But we'll be a lot safer the further we get from Bergen Town.
[KING GRISTLE SR.] That's right! Take her away!
Get her out of my sight!
She is hereby banished from Bergen Town forever.
We can all be happy again.
And shove them down your ungrateful throats.
I never got to eat a Troll.
What's gonna make me happy now?
You will never, ever, ever, ever be happy.
translation.ko: 넌 죽었다 깨어나도 절대 행복해질 수 없어

translation.en: This is where we will rebuild our civilization.
♪ Ba de ya Say do you remember ♪
♪ Ba de ya Dancing in September ♪
♪ Ba de ya Never was a cloudy day ♪
[POPPY] Twenty years ago today, King Peppy made us safe...
translation.ko: '20년 전 오늘 페피 왕이 우릴 구했고'

translation.en: and now every Troll is free
to be happy and live in perfect...
translation.ko: '이제 트롤들은 행복하게 살고 있다, 완벽한…' '조화 속에서'

translation.en: And that's why we hug every hour. Yep.
translation.ko: - 그래서 우린 한 시간마다 껴안지 - 맞아

translation.en: I wish it was every half hour.
But that wouldn't leave much time for singing and dancing, now would it?
Princess Poppy, do the Bergens still want to eat us?
translation.ko: 파피 공주님, 버겐은 아직 우릴 먹으려고 해요?

translation.en: But just because it's the only way they'll ever be happy.
[SLURPS] Oh, no. I do taste delicious.
Isn't there anything else to make them happy?
translation.ko: 다른 방법으로 행복해질 순 없어요? 생일 파티는 어때요?

translation.en: Ooh. What about having birthday parties?
Or staring at your parents while they sleep.
But I don't want to be food.
Don't worry. No Troll ever will be.
And that's why we're celebrating with the biggest party ever.
translation.ko: 그래서 아주 성대한 파티를 할 거야

translation.en: ♪ Everybody, move your hair and feel united ♪
translation.ko: 모두 머리를 흔들며 리듬을 느껴 봐

translation.en: ♪ Everybody, shake your hair and feel united ♪
translation.ko: 모두 머리를 흔들며 리듬을 느껴 봐
모두 함께 즐겨 봐 모두 초대할게 머리를 흔들며 파티해

translation.en: ♪ I'ma hook you up with the invitation ♪ ♪ Let your hair swing and party with me ♪
♪ No bad vibes Just love, you'll see ♪

translation.ko: 신나게 춤을 춰 봐 하나, 둘, 셋, 넷

translation.en: ♪ Stick to the B-E-A-T Get ready to ♪
♪ You are such a P-Y-T Catching all the lights ♪
translation.ko: 모두 너만 쳐다봐 넌 정말 예뻐

translation.en: ♪ Just easy as A-B-C That's how you make it right ♪
♪ It ain't hard out here When you're doing it right ♪
♪ Put a smile on blast That's the Troll life ♪
♪ And I'm here to help you through it ♪ ♪ Come on, Smidge, I know you can do it ♪
translation.ko: 내가 도와줄게 스미지, 넌 할 수 있어!

translation.en: ♪ Don't stop, don't stop Don't stop the beat ♪
♪ I can't stop, can't stop Can't stop the beat ♪
translation.ko: - 멈출 수 없어 - 멈출 수 없어

translation.en: ♪ I won't stop, won't stop Won't stop the beat ♪
♪ Everybody, shake your hair and feel united ♪
translation.ko: 모두 머리를 흔들며 리듬을 느껴 봐

translation.en: ♪ Everybody, move your hair and feel united ♪
translation.ko: 모두 머리를 흔들며 리듬을 느껴 봐

translation.en: I could hear you from a mile away!
Good. I was worried we weren't projecting enough.
Poppy, if I can hear you, so can the Bergens.
translation.ko: 파피, 나한테 들리면 버겐한테도 들릴 거야

translation.en: Here we go again. Oh, Branch...
Come on! We haven't seen a Bergen in 20 years.
No, they're not going to find me, because I'll be in my highly camouflaged...
translation.ko: 아니, 날 못 찾겠지 난 정교하게 위장된
철통 보안을 갖춘 지하 벙커에 있을 테니까

translation.en: You mean you're not coming to the party tonight?
[BOTH] But it's going to be the biggest... The loudest...
You're just gonna lead the Bergens right to us!
Are you sure you wanna invite this party pooper to poop on your party?
translation.ko: 정말 이 녀석을 초대해서 파티 망치게 놔둘 거야?

translation.en: Yes. I think everyone deserves to be happy.
Branch, I know you have happiness inside you.
You just need our help to find it.
I wouldn't be caught dead at your party, but you will be.
translation.ko: - 맙소사 - 난 죽어도 안 가겠지만 넌 갈 거야

translation.en: Thank you for providing safe passage, brother.
Okay, first of all, mate, thanks for sharing your unique perspective on things.
But, just for now, why don't you try on some positivity, eh?
translation.ko: 근데 한 번만 긍정적으로 생각해 볼까?

translation.en: A little positivity might go with that vest.
I'm positive you all are going to get eaten.
Hug time! It is hug time.
Oh, that feels good. Our hearts are synchronizing!
Someday, when the Bergens find us...
and the survival of every Troll is in your hands...
translation.ko: 트롤의 운명이 네 손에 달릴 때도

translation.en: I sure hope the answer is singing, dancing, and hugging...
translation.ko: 노래하고 춤추고 껴안을 수 있나 보자

translation.en: because that's all you know how to do.
That is not true! Poppy can also scrapbook.
I can't believe you're gonna be queen one day.
Tune out his negative vibrations, Poppy. They're toxic.
Some folks just don't want to be happy.
Whoo! I love you so much!
I just want to take a moment...
She's my friend! I know her!
I'd like to take a second to celebrate our king...
saved all of us from those dreaded...
Blend in! Blend in! Blend in!
What are we gonna do now?
We have to find a new home. Everyone, hurry.
translation.ko: 새 집을 찾아야 해 모두 서둘러

translation.en: We have to leave before the Bergens come back.
No, Poppy, we have to run. Now, let's go, everyone. Come on!
translation.ko: 아니, 도망쳐야 해 어서 가자, 어서!

translation.en: That was a long time ago. And I'm not the king I once was.
translation.ko: 그건 오래전 얘기야 나도 이제 늙었어

translation.en: I have to at least try.
No. You can't go to Bergen Town by yourself.
translation.ko: 혼자서 버겐 타운에 갈 순 없어

translation.en: [MALE TROLL ON RECORDING] ♪ Celebrate freedom from the Bergens ♪
Branch, you're invited! No! No! No! [SHUSHING]
Branch, are you in there? Huh?
I'm not going to your party.
The party's over. We just got attacked by a Bergen.
I have to tell you something. Shh.

translation.ko: 뭐? 버겐이 올지도 모르는데 꼭 해야 되는 말이 뭐야?

translation.en: What could be so important that it's worth leading the Bergen right to us?
translation.ko: 버겐이 올지도 모르는데 꼭 해야 되는 말이 뭐야?

translation.en: The Bergen's gone! You don't know that. It could still be out there.
translation.ko: - 버겐은 갔어 - 모르지, 아직 있을지도 몰라

translation.en: It took Cooper, and Smidge, and Fuzzbert...
and Satin, and Chenille, and Biggie, and Guy Diamond, and Creek!
translation.ko: 새틴, 셰닐, 비기 가이 다이아몬드, 크릭까지

translation.en: Mmm. Which is why I have to ask you.
Will you go to Bergen Town with me and save everyone?
translation.ko: 나랑 버겐 타운에 가서 구해 올래?

translation.en: Branch, you can't say no. They're your friends.
I'm staying right here in my bunker where it's safe.

translation.ko: 잘났다 버겐을 제일 잘 아는 네가

translation.en: You're the one guy who knows more about Bergens than anyone...
but when we finally need you, you just want to hide here forever?
translation.ko: 가장 필요한 때에 영원히 숨어 지내겠다고?

translation.en: Yeah... I really only have enough supplies down here to last me 10 years...
11 if I'm willing to store and drink my own sweat.
You all said I was crazy, huh?
I'm sorry. I should have listened to you.
You told me not to throw the party, and I threw it anyway.
translation.ko: 넌 파티를 열지 말랬는데 내가 듣지 않아서

translation.en: And it's my fault they were taken.
And now I don't know what to do.
Why don't you try scrapbooking them to freedom?
Hey, anytime, Poppy. See you in 10 years.
Just wondering if I could borrow something. [SIGHS] What?
Whoa, wait! Poppy, what are you doing?
You said you have enough provisions to last 10 years, right?
Yes, to last me 10 years. Me!
Then I guess I better hurry.
You won't last a day out there.
And you won't last a day in here.
Don't worry, Dad. I can do this.
translation.ko: 걱정 마세요, 아빠 할 수 있어요
금세 커 버린다니까 안녕, 여러분 곧 만나요
- 행운을 빌게, 파피 공주! - 행운을 빌게, 파피 공주!

translation.en: No. [ALL CHANTING] Hug time! Hug time! Hug time!
Princess Poppy set off to rescue her other friends...
translation.ko: 파피 공주는 잡혀간 친구들을 구하러 갔어요

translation.en: confident she'd make it to Bergen Town on her own.
translation.ko: 혼자 버겐 타운에 갈 자신이 있었죠

translation.en: Convinced she'd make it to Bergen Town.
Totally sure she'd make it to Bergen Town.
♪ I really hope I can do it ♪
♪ I know that I must leave the only home I've ever known ♪
♪ And brave the dangers of the forest ♪ ♪ Saving them before they're eaten ♪
translation.ko: 위험한 숲을 헤치고 친구들을 구해야 해

translation.en: ♪ I mean, how hard can that be ♪
♪ Looking up at a sunny sky ♪ ♪ So shiny and blue and there's a butterfly ♪
translation.ko: 맑고 푸른 하늘에 나비 한 마리

translation.en: ♪ Well, isn't that a super fantastic sign ♪
♪ It's gonna be a fantastic day ♪
translation.ko: 멋진 하루가 될 거야 놀라운 일이 생길 거야

translation.en: ♪ Got a pocket full of songs that I'm gonna sing ♪
♪ And I'm ready to take on anything ♪
♪ Some super fun surprise around each corner ♪
translation.ko: 모퉁이를 돌 때마다 신나는 일이 생길 거야

translation.en: ♪ Hey I'm not giving up today ♪
♪ There's nothing getting in my way ♪
translation.ko: 그 무엇도 날 막을 순 없어

translation.en: ♪ And if you knock, knock me over ♪
♪ I will get back up again ♪
♪ Oh If something goes a little wrong ♪
translation.ko: 무슨 일이 생겨도 난 이겨낼 거야

translation.en: ♪ Well you can go ahead and bring it on ♪
♪ 'Cause if you knock, knock me over ♪
♪ I will get back up again ♪
♪ I'm marching along I've got confidence ♪
♪ I'm cooler than a pack of peppermints ♪
♪ And I haven't been this excited ♪
♪ I'm off on this remarkable adventure ♪
♪ But what if it's all a big mistake ♪
♪ What if it's more than I can take ♪
♪ No, I can't think that way ♪
♪ 'Cause I know that I'm really, really, really gonna be okay ♪
♪ Hey I'm not giving up today ♪
♪ There's nothing getting in my way ♪
♪ And if you knock, knock me over ♪
♪ I will get back up again ♪
translation.ko: 쓰러져도 다시 일어날 거야 무슨 일이 생겨도 난 이겨낼 거야

translation.en: ♪ Oh, if something goes a little wrong ♪ ♪ Well you can go ahead and bring it on ♪
translation.ko: 무슨 일이 생겨도 난 이겨낼 거야

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause if you knock, knock me over ♪
♪ I will get back up again ♪
♪ And if you knock, knock me over ♪ ♪ You knock, knock me over ♪
♪ I will get back up again ♪
Oh, right. Like you knew I was coming.
Yes! I figured after the third hug time...
translation.ko: 그럼! 포옹 시간 세 번 겪고 나면

translation.en: getting eaten by a Bergen wouldn't seem so bad.
translation.ko: 차라리 버겐한테 먹히고 싶어질 줄 알았어

translation.en: And I figured there was no way you could do this by yourself.
translation.ko: 난 네가 혼자선 못 해낼 줄 알았으니

translation.en: Hmm. All right. Let's do this!
Sooner we get to Bergen Town, sooner we can rescue everybody...
translation.ko: 어서 버겐 타운에 가서 친구들을 구해

translation.en: Wait, wait, wait. What's your plan?
I just told you. To rescue everyone and make it home safely.
Okay. That's not a plan. That's a wish list.
Oh! I suppose you have a plan.
we get to the edge of Bergen Town without being spotted.
Then, we get inside by sneaking through the old escape tunnels...
which will then lead us to the Troll Tree...
right before we get caught, and suffer a miserable death...
translation.ko: 그럼 피에 굶주린 끔찍한 버겐의 손에 잡혀

translation.en: at the hands of a horrible, bloodthirsty Bergen!
translation.ko: 참혹한 죽음을… 잠깐, 내 계획으로 스크랩북 만드는 거야?

translation.en: Hold on a second, are you scrapbooking my plan?
translation.ko: 잠깐, 내 계획으로 스크랩북 만드는 거야?

translation.en: [POPPY] I always sing when I'm in a good mood.
[BRANCH] Do you have to be in a good mood?
By this time tomorrow, I'll be with all my friends!
Oh, I wonder what they're doing right now.
They're alive, Branch. I know it!
And I can't wait to see the look on your face...
when you realize the world isn't all cupcakes and rainbows.
and there's nothing you can do about it.
Hey, I know it's not all cupcakes and rainbows.
translation.ko: 나도 세상이 아름답지만은 않다는 걸 알아

translation.en: But I'd rather go through life thinking that it mostly is...
You don't sing, you don't dance.
So grey all the time! What happened to you?
You just said that so I'd stop talking.
translation.ko: 그냥 내 입 막으려고 한 소리지?

translation.en: Good night, Smidge. Good night, Fuzzbert.
translation.ko: 잘 자, 스미지 잘 자, 퍼즈버트

translation.en: Good night, Satin. Good night, Chenille.
translation.ko: 잘 자, 새틴 잘 자, 셰닐

translation.en: Good night, Biggie. Good night, DJ.
translation.ko: 잘 자, 비기 잘 자, 디제이

translation.en: Yes, seriously! Singing helps me relax.
Maybe you ought to try it.
I don't sing, and I don't relax. This is the way I am, and I like it.
translation.ko: 난 노래도, 편안한 것도 싫어 그냥 이런 게 좋아

translation.en: I also like a little silence.
♪ I've come to talk with you again ♪
♪ Left its seeds while I was sleeping ♪
♪ And the vision that was planted in my brain ♪
[POPPY] So one of these tunnels leads to the Troll Tree.
translation.ko: 이 중 하나가 트롤 나무로 통한다고?

translation.en: For one will lead to Bergen Town...
and the others, to certain death. [ECHOING]

translation.ko: 나야 안녕, 얘들아? 터널에 온 걸 환영해

translation.en: Hey, guys, how's it going? Welcome to the root tunnels.
translation.ko: 안녕, 얘들아? 터널에 온 걸 환영해 경고하는데

translation.en: Uh, I just wanted to warn you.
One of these tunnels leads to the Troll Tree...
and the others to [IN DEEP VOICE] certain death, death, death, death...
Do you think you can tell us which is the right one?
Great! No, that's okay. We're fine, thanks!
I don't like the looks of him.
I mean, who wears socks with no shoes?
He seems to know what he's talking about.
First, you have to give me a high five. Then I'll tell you.
What? Oh, I love high fives. I'll do it.
Oh, I know you'll do it.
All right, dumpy diapers, up high!
Nope, I don't do high fives.
Slap it, boss. Not gonna happen.
Party on the top floor. Nope.
That's weird. Come on, just one little high five.
Really cleared up exactly what I will not be doing.
The others lead to certain death. Get perspective.
[SIGHS] One high five and then you'll tell us
translation.ko: 하이파이브 한 번만 하면 터널을 알려 줄 거지?
하이파이브 한 번만 하면 터널을 알려 줄 거지? 아주 쉬워

translation.en: I'm gonna let you slide with a fist bump.
translation.ko: 주먹 인사로 대신하자 상어 공격! 냠냠냠냠 해파리!

translation.en: Helicopter. Last Supper. Monkey in a zoo.
Okay, okay, okay. Now I'm thinking we hug.
[BRANCH] That's right. You better run, Cloud! [POPPY] Wait!
I'm gonna tear your little cloud arms...
off your cloud body, and high five your face with them!
translation.ko: 구름 팔을 뽑아 얼굴에 하이파이브 해 주지!

translation.en: [BRANCH] Get back here! [POPPY] Branch! He can help us!
You guys are a lot of fun. You know, I gotta go.
Got some cloud stuff to take care of. Catch you on the way back?
[ALL] ♪ I ain't happy I'm feeling glad ♪
♪ I got sunshine in a bag I'm useless ♪
♪ But not for long The future is coming on ♪
♪ I ain't happy I'm feeling glad ♪
I got sunshine in a bag I'm useless ♪
translation.ko: 난 쓸모 없지만 희망에 차 있어

translation.en: ♪ But not for long The future is coming on ♪
♪ Is coming on Is coming on ♪
♪ Is coming on Is coming on ♪
Wow! They're as miserable as you.
Which means they haven't eaten a Troll yet.
Now, come on. Let's go save our friends.
You're my only friend in this whole miserable world.
translation.ko: 이 비참한 세상에 내 친구는 너뿐이야

translation.en: I'll never ever, never ever, never be happy.
translation.ko: 난 절대로, 무슨 짓을 해도 행복해질 수 없어

translation.en: Chef, where did you come from?
My father banished you 20 years ago.
Have you been standing behind that plant this whole time?
translation.ko: 줄곧 저 화초 뒤에 숨어 있었어?

translation.en: No. I've been out in the wilderness...
thinking of nothing but how I let you down.
If only there was some way I could make you feel better.
translation.ko: 폐하를 위로할 수만 있다면 얼마나 좋을까요?

translation.en: The only way I'll ever be happy is by eating a Troll...
and that ain't gonna happen, thanks to you.
translation.ko: 이젠 물 건너 갔어 너 때문에!

translation.en: Ah, but it just might. Thanks to me.
So this means I might actually get to be happy!
Of course, everyone else in Bergen Town will still be miserable...
translation.ko: 물론 다른 버겐들은 계속 불행할 테지만

translation.en: I am their king, so maybe it kinda is.
Yes! That's exactly what I'm proposing.
Great idea, sire. Absolutely brilliant. Aren't you smart?
And I, your loyal Chef, will be right behind you.
translation.ko: 왕궁의 주방장인 제가 폐하 뒤에 있을게요

translation.en: Holding a knife, a spoon, a ladle.
You, scullery maid, what's your name?
Congratulations, Idget. You work for me now.
So you take those dishes downstairs and you start scrubbing.
Shh. Don't cry, Mr. Dinkles. Shh!
Guys, Mr. Dinkles is really freaking out!
Whoa, whoa! Everyone, we must all remain calm.
A calm Troll is a tasty Troll.
translation.ko: 그래, 차분한 트롤이 맛있지 너희는 내 성공에 쓰일 주재료란다

translation.en: And you are a key ingredient in my recipe for success.
he who controls the Trolls controls the Kingdom.

translation.ko: 그리고 그 남자가 바로 나야! 당신 남자였어?

translation.en: By this time tomorrow, I'll be queen...
and all of Bergen Town will get exactly what they deserve.
So where do you think our friends are?
If I had to guess, I'd say in a Bergen's stomach.
Could you try to be positive?
Just once. You might like it.
Okay. I'm sure they're not only alive...
but about to be delivered to us on a silver platter.
[SIGHS] Thank you. That wasn't so hard, was it?
This is gonna be the best Trollstice ever!
translation.ko: 최고의 트롤 축제가 될 거야! 난 천재라니까

translation.en: Such a great idea I had.
translation.ko: 최고의 트롤 축제가 될 거야! 난 천재라니까 내일은 트롤 축제니까 철저히 준비해!

translation.en: [CHEF] Yes. Tomorrow is Trollstice, everyone. And it must be perfect!
Feels great to be ordering everyone around again.

translation.ko: - 브랜치, 저기 봐 - 살아 있네? 은접시에 담겨 있어 우리 둘 다 맞았네

translation.en: And on a silver platter, too. We were both right.
translation.ko: 은접시에 담겨 있어 우리 둘 다 맞았네

translation.en: And to mark the occasion, Your Highness, look.
I found your old Troll bib.
[KING GRISTLE] Oh, wow! I bet you still fit.
We'll see who's laughing when I bite your yummy head off.
When I bite all y'alls yummy heads off.
Wait a minute. Chef, this isn't enough yummy heads to feed all of Bergen Town.
How are we supposed to have Trollstice if there's not enough Trolls?
translation.ko: 트롤이 부족한데 어떻게 트롤 축제를 열어?

translation.en: Oh, there's plenty more where that came from, sire.
Because I promised everyone a Troll.
[CHEF] No, no, no, sire! Everything will be fine.
would I be willing to do this?
Enjoy a taste of true happiness.

translation.ko: 트롤 축제까지 기다려야 하지 않아? 트롤만 있으면 늘 트롤 축제예요

translation.en: Sire, every day is Trollstice when you have Trolls.
But my dad said the first time should be special.
Well, you're the king now. [CREEK GROANING]
But I think I should share this moment
translation.ko: 하지만 이 순간을 백성들과 나누고 싶어
하지만 이 순간을 백성들과 나누고 싶어 드세요!

translation.en: Idget, lock these Trolls in your room and guard them with your life.
translation.ko: 브리짓, 트롤들을 방에 가두고 목숨 걸고 지켜

translation.en: Branch, we have to save him!
Save him from what? His stomach?
We didn't see him chew. We didn't see him swallow!
translation.ko: 씹는 건 못 봤어 삼키는 것도

translation.en: Face it, Poppy. Sometimes people go into other people's mouths...
If we go after Creek now, we're going to get eaten.
I'm sorry... but it's too late for him.
[CHEF] Wash these pots and pans for Trollstice.
translation.ko: 냄비와 팬을 닦고 트롤 축제 준비해

translation.en: ♪ I've been alone with you inside my mind ♪
translation.ko: 그대를 가슴 속에 품은 채 홀로 지냈어요

translation.en: ♪ And in my dreams I've kissed your lips ♪
♪ I sometimes see you pass outside my door ♪
♪ Is it me you're looking for ♪
♪ I can see it in your eyes ♪
♪ I can see it in your smile ♪
♪ And my arms are open wide ♪
♪ 'Cause you know just what to say ♪
You're all the idiots! I have to do everything myself.
♪ And you know just what to do ♪
I have to get out of bed,
translation.ko: 내 손으로 옷을 입고 신발 끈을 매야 해?

translation.en: I'm supposed to put my own clothes on, tie my own shoes. ♪ And I want to tell you so much ♪
Oh, she's in love with the king.
What are you talking about? Bergens don't have feelings.
Well, maybe you don't know everything about the Bergens.
♪ There's a party going on right here ♪
translation.ko: - 여기서 파티하는 거야 - 여기서 파티하는 거야 아니! 여기서 파티하면 안 돼

translation.en: No! There is not a party going on right here.
The sooner we get you guys out of here...
The sooner we can save Creek!
Is it me you're looking for?
I know you're looking for the cupcakes and rainbows here...
but let's face it, Creek's been eaten.
They put him in a taco!
Poppy, how could you possibly think Creek's still alive?
translation.ko: 어떻게 크릭이 아직 살아 있다고 생각해?

translation.en: I don't think he's alive. I hope he's alive, and that's enough.
translation.ko: 그게 아니라 살아 있길 바라는 것뿐이야

translation.en: How do you always look on the bright side?
There is no bright side here. None!
Hey! Where do you think you're going?
Glitter! No! Get back in your cage!
You're in love with King Gristle.
Um, I don't know what you're talking about.
It's not like he even knows I'm alive.
What if there was a way we could both get what we want?
translation.ko: 우리 둘 다 원하는 걸 얻을 수 있어

translation.en: That Troll King Gristle put in his mouth, that's Creek.
translation.ko: 그리스틀 왕이 입에 넣은 트롤은 크릭이야 그 애를 꼭 구해야 해

translation.en: And I would do anything to save him.
we can't get anywhere near the king without him eating us.
translation.ko: 우린 왕의 눈에 띄면 잡아먹힐 거야

translation.en: You can walk right up to him and tell him how you feel.
I can't just walk right up to the king.
His Royal Awesomeness would never talk to a scullery maid like me.
translation.ko: 폐하는 나 같은 부엌데기는 쳐다보지도 않을걸

translation.en: What if he didn't know you were a scullery maid?
translation.ko: 부엌데기인 줄 모르게 하면 되지 멋진 여자로 보이는 거야

translation.en: What if he thought you were this total babe?
translation.ko: 멋진 여자로 보이는 거야 멋진 여자가 부엌데기 옷을 입어?

translation.en: What kind of total babe would be dressed like a scullery maid?
What if we made you a new outfit? I'm thinking...
translation.ko: - 새 옷을 만들어 줄게 - 어디 보자…

translation.en: What's the point of a jumping suit if I still have this hair?
translation.ko: 머리가 이 모양인데 점프슈트 입으면 뭐 해?

translation.en: What's the point of a new outfit and new hair...
translation.ko: 새 옷을 입고 머리를 하면 뭐 해?

translation.en: if I don't even know what a total babe would ever say?
[POPPY] We can help with that too!
You get us Creek, and we'll get you a date with the king.
translation.ko: 크릭에게 데려다주면 왕과 데이트하게 해 줄게

translation.en: [ALL] ♪ When you look in the mirror ♪ ♪ Let it disappear ♪
Sing with us! [ALL] Yeah, Branch, sing with us!
translation.ko: - 그래, 같이 노래해 - 그래, 같이 노래해

translation.en: You don't think this will work?
Oh, no, no. It's not that. I just don't sing.
translation.ko: 그런 게 아냐 난 노래 안 해

translation.en: He's right. This idea is stupid.
[CRYING] King Gristle will never love me.
translation.ko: 그리스틀 왕은 날 사랑하지 않을 거야

translation.en: [COOPER] Come on. Hey, hey. What's all this?
That's right, Bridget. Just let it all out.
Bridget, let it go. Just have a good cry. Go, girl!
Okay, now bring it back in.
I told you, I don't sing.
translation.ko: 안 한다니까 - 해야 돼! - 미안하지만 못 해

translation.en: Well, you have to! I'm sorry. I can't.
translation.ko: - 해야 돼! - 미안하지만 못 해 할 수 있어 안 하는 거지

translation.en: No, you can. You just won't. Fine. I just won't.
translation.ko: 할 수 있어 안 하는 거지 - 좋아, 안 할래 - 해야 돼
- 좋아, 안 할래 - 해야 돼 - 안 돼 - 해!

translation.en: Yes! No! Why not? Why won't you sing?
Because singing killed my grandma, okay?
My uncle broke his neck tap dancing once.
translation.ko: 내 삼촌은 탭댄스 추다 목이 부러졌어

translation.en: How did singing kill your grandma?
♪ And I need you now tonight ♪
translation.ko: 오늘 밤 내 곁에 있어 줘요

translation.en: ♪ And I need you more than ever ♪
[BRANCH] That day, I was so lost in song...
I didn't hear my grandma trying to warn me.
♪ And we'll only be making it right ♪
[ALL] ♪ Once upon a time ♪ ♪ There was light in his life ♪
♪ But now there's only love in the dark ♪
♪ A total eclipse of the heart ♪
I haven't sung a note since.
I'm so sorry, Branch. I had no idea.
I just assumed you had a terrible voice.
translation.ko: 그냥 목소리가 별로여서 그런 줄 알았어

translation.en: No, no, it was like an angel's.
At least, that's what Grandma used to say.
Whoa, whoa. What are you doing? It's not hug time.
I just thought you could use one.

translation.ko: 피어날 거야 비 온 뒤의 태양처럼 활짝 웃을 거야

translation.en: ♪ Yo I'm coming out like the sun after rain ♪
translation.ko: 비 온 뒤의 태양처럼 활짝 웃을 거야

translation.en: ♪ No time to be playin' Feelin' good ♪
translation.ko: 찬란히 빛나는 해처럼 내 마음을 보여 줄 거야

translation.en: ♪ Gonna get get what I, what I want ♪

translation.ko: 맘껏 뽐낼 거야 당당한 내 모습

translation.en: ♪ Look at me now, my confidence is soaring ♪
♪ Dudes be impressed with the points I'm scoring like ♪

translation.ko: - 괜찮은데! - 괜찮은데! 왕은 입을 떡 벌리겠지

translation.en: ♪ And it just don't quit Watch the king drop his jaw ♪
♪ When I'm shaking my hips I'm saying ♪
♪ It's time to take a stand ♪ ♪ Hey ♪
♪ And show the world that I'm comin' out ♪ ♪ She's comin' out ♪
translation.ko: - 온 세상에 보여 줄래 - 보여 줄 거야

translation.en: [KING GRISTLE] No, no, no! It's all wrong!
I'm the king who's bringing back Trollstice.
I need a bib to match.
I look like a child in this one. Oh, sire!
Oh, he'll know that I'm just a scullery maid. No, no, no!
I got to get out of here.
I'll be right here for you, Bridget. We all will.
translation.ko: 내가 여기 있을게 우리 모두 있을 거야

translation.en: You'll tell me what to say, right? Of course, I will.
Just wait until we get inside.
Ooh, Sire! I believe I have the perfect bib!
It better be! Trollstice is tomorrow night.
I mean, I look good. But I have to look great.
translation.ko: 난 늘 멋지지만 내일은 끝내주게 멋져야 해

translation.en: [GASPS] It's got a wing-dingle on it!
Oh, Your Majesty! Look at you! Such a big, big boy.
P-H, phat. Then strike that pose.
Total honesty from a total babe.
My name is Lady Glittersparkles, seriously.
Would you care to join me for an evening...
at Captain Starfunkle's Roller Rink and Arcade?
When are you gonna ask him about Creek?
We have to warm him up first. Don't you know anything about romance?
translation.ko: 우선 분위기를 잡아야지 연애도 안 해 봤어?

translation.en: Of course! I'm passionate about it. Really?
translation.ko: - 당연히 해 봤지, 불타는 연애! - 정말?

translation.en: Don't you know anything about sarcasm?
I think I had a sarcasm once.
translation.ko: 나는 비꼰 적 한 번 있어

translation.en: And I'll take one of everything, Bibbly.
Things are gonna get messy. [BELLS JINGLING]
Enjoy your pizza. Here's your tokens.
Good thing I brought my appetite.
No! I meant say something nice about him.
But I do like his back.
face, back of your head. Are you okay?
What's going on? Are you making fun of me?
I fear if I dive in...
I might never come up for air.
I might never come up for air.
and refuses to come out from behind the clouds...
Knowing it cannot shine half as bright.
translation.ko: 당신만큼 찬란하게 빛날 수 없을 테니까요

translation.en: I kinda do have a nice smile, don't I?
I can't believe I'm about to say this...
But being here with you today...
makes me realize that true happiness is possible.
translation.ko: 나도 행복해질 수 있을 것 같아요

translation.en: True happiness is a lot closer than you think.
[GASPS] Creek? I knew he was alive!
I've been savoring this little guy. [GASPS] Help!
Tell me, my lady, will I be seeing you at the Trollstice feast?
Yeah! You're not kidding, you will.
Because you're gonna be there as my plus one.
Yes! Meantimes, maybe we should find some other way to...
Oh, yeah? What did you have in mind?
She's, uh, gonna be my plus one.
For a moment there I was concerned you were changing the plan.
Well, this won't be a problem at all, Your Highness.
I'll just get my worthless scullery maid to get...
another place setting ready for the lovely...
[KING GRISTLE] Put her place setting next to mine.
I want her right by my side...
I'll see you at Trollstice, yeah?
I think the king really likes us.
That was the greatest day of my life!
I just never thought something like that could happen to me.
translation.ko: 나한테 이런 일이 생길 줄은 몰랐는데

translation.en: I'm so excited I could just scream.
Oh, I could scream too! Creek is alive!
Nothing. I thought we were celebrating.
Well, you're gonna have plenty of practice, because we're gonna save Creek...
translation.ko: 앞으론 자주 하게 될 거야 곧 크릭을 구하면

translation.en: and life will be all cupcakes and rainbows again.
Lady Glittersparkles is gonna be the king's plus one at dinner.
translation.ko: 레이디 글리터스파클이 만찬 때 왕의 파트너가 될 거야

translation.en: The dinner where they're serving Troll?
Yeah, I think we're gonna have to skip that one.
No! No, you have to help me be Lady Glittersparkles.
translation.ko: 아냐, 날 레이디 글리터스파클로 만들어 줘
너희가 필요해 영원히 딴 사람 행세를 할 순 없어

translation.en: You don't wanna pretend to be someone you're not forever!
translation.ko: 영원히 딴 사람 행세를 할 순 없어

translation.en: Then how about just for tomorrow?
Bridget, you don't need us anymore.
You and the king can make each other happy!
That's impossible! Only eating a Troll can make you happy.
translation.ko: 말도 안 돼! 트롤을 먹어야 행복해져

translation.en: I wish I'd never gone on this stupid date!
translation.ko: 이런 엉터리 데이트는 하지 말 걸 그랬어

translation.en: Just go! Get out of my room. Leave me alone.
translation.ko: 내 방에서 나가! 날 내버려 둬

translation.en: The king's bringing a plus one.
I just have to lose 30 pounds in the next eight hours.
translation.ko: 8시간 동안 10킬로만 빼면 돼 "운동할 때 듣는 음악"

translation.en: ♪ I feel good I feel good ♪
♪ I feel good I feel good ♪
Creek, we'll have you out of there in a second.
Branch, give him to me. Go!
I'm sorry, Poppy. We're too late.
Sorry, but I can't have you leaving before tomorrow's dinner.
translation.ko: 미안하지만 내일이 축제인데 보낼 순 없지

translation.en: A dinner to which you are all invited.
I mean every Troll in Troll Village.
You'll never find them. Not where they're hiding.
Oh, you're right. I couldn't find them.
But I could with someone they know.
I'm sure there's a reasonable explanation. At least give him a chance.
translation.ko: 분명 이유가 있을 거야 얘길 들어 보자

translation.en: As I was about to accept my fate...
I had, what I can only describe as...

translation.ko: 먹지 마 다른 애를 먹어 나만 빼고

translation.en: Eat someone else. Anyone else. Everyone else. But not me!
But the king wants to be happy now.
Wait! Wait! There must be some other way.
No! Creek, please don't do this.
I wish there was some other me-not-getting-eaten way.
translation.ko: 내가 안 먹히고도 해결할 방법이 있으면 좋겠지만

translation.en: And now I have to live with this for the rest of my life.
translation.ko: 이제 난 평생 죄책감 속에 살겠지

translation.en: At least you get to die with a clear conscience.
My baby did it! Poppy did it!

translation.ko: "행복한 트롤 축제" - 트롤 축제! - 트롤 축제!

translation.en: Now let's prepare the main course.
Poppy! Oh, thank goodness you're all right.
I got everybody I love thrown in a pot. Thanks for asking.
translation.ko: 사랑하는 친구들 모두 냄비 속에 갇혀 기쁘네요

translation.en: I don't know why I thought I could save you.
All I wanted to do was keep everyone safe, like you did, Dad.
The world isn't all cupcakes and rainbows.
♪ In a world full of people ♪
♪ You can lose sight of it all ♪
♪ Can make you feel so small ♪
What are you doing? The king is waiting.
♪ Don't be unhappy, can't remember when ♪
♪ And you've taken all you can bear ♪
♪ And I see your true colors ♪
♪ And that's why I love you ♪
♪ Like a rainbow ♪ ♪ Oh, oh, oh ♪
For showing me how to be happy.
Happiness is inside of all of us, right?
Sometimes, you just need someone to help you find it.
What's gonna happen now, Princess Poppy?
But I know we're not giving up.
This is it, Mr. Dinkles. This is it.

translation.ko: 뭐 하는 거야? 너희가 먹히게 둘 순 없어

translation.en: I can't let them eat you.
Hurry! Go, go, go! Get out of here!
No! Bridget, if you go in there without us, you know what they'll do.
translation.ko: 안 돼! 널 가만 안 둘 거야

translation.en: You showed me what it feels like to be happy.
I never would have known if it wasn't for you.
And I love you for that.
Go on, now. You have to hurry!
And make it easier for them to find you?
No way! You have to go. Now!
Chef, shouldn't we wait for Lady Glittersparkles?
Now, everyone, there will be no Trolls until...
the king's plus one has arrived.
Well, unless she doesn't come at all.
But that's crazy talk. Who wouldn't wanna be with you?
translation.ko: 말도 안 돼요 누가 폐하를 마다하겠어요?
한 명도 두고 가면 안 돼

translation.en: Bridget just ruined her life to save ours. It's not right!
She deserves to be happy as much as we do.
All right, everybody. Who's ready to eat Trolls?
there is only one thing that will ever make you happy...
translation.ko: 폐하께 행복을 드릴 수 있는 버겐은

translation.en: and only one Bergen who can provide it.
Because she didn't think you would want someone like her.
Is it me you're looking for?
King Gristle, when you were with Bridget, you were feeling something, weren't you?
translation.ko: 그리스틀, 브리짓과 있을 때 뭔가 느꼈지?

translation.en: Yeah, I was. I just thought it was too much pizza.
But you have to eat a Troll to be happy.

translation.ko: 누구나 알잖아 아니야? 하지만 그리스틀은 트롤을 먹어 본 적 없잖아?

translation.en: But King Gristle's never eaten a Troll in his life, right?
translation.ko: 하지만 그리스틀은 트롤을 먹어 본 적 없잖아?

translation.en: [CHEF] Don't listen to her! There's only one way to be happy.
I'll serve you Troll every day of the year.
all of life will be a never-ending feast of happiness!
Happiness isn't something you put inside.
Sometimes you just need someone to help you find it.
I want to be happy! And me!
Do you really think I can be happy?
It's inside you! It's inside of all of us!
♪ I got this feeling inside my bones ♪
♪ It goes electric wavy when I turn it on ♪
♪ And if you want it inside your soul ♪
♪ Just open up your heart Let music take control ♪
♪ I've got that sunshine in my pocket ♪
♪ Got that good soul in my feet ♪
♪ I feel that hot blood in my body ♪ ♪ When it drops ♪
♪ Ooh ♪ ♪ I can't take my eyes up off it Moving so phenomenally ♪
♪ The room on lock The way we rock it ♪
♪ Under the lights, when everything goes ♪
♪ Nowhere to hide when I'm getting you close ♪
♪ When we move well you already know ♪
♪ So just imagine, just imagine, just imagine ♪
♪ Nothing I can see but you when you dance, dance, dance ♪
♪ Feel the good-good creeping up on you ♪ ♪ So just dance, dance, dance, come on ♪
translation.ko: 짜릿한 이 느낌 맘껏 춤춰 봐

translation.en: ♪ All those things I shouldn't do ♪ ♪ But you dance, dance, dance ♪
♪ And ain't nobody leaving soon So keep dancing ♪
Let's do it! ♪ I can't stop the ♪
♪ I can't stop the I can't stop the ♪
♪ Nothing I can see but you when you dance, dance, dance ♪
translation.ko: 춤추는 그대 내 눈 속엔 그대 모습뿐

translation.en: ♪ Feel the good creeping up on you ♪ ♪ So just dance, dance, dance ♪
♪ All those things I shouldn't do ♪ ♪ But you dance, dance, dance ♪
♪ And ain't nobody leaving soon So keep dancing ♪
♪ Got this feeling in my body ♪
♪ Got this feeling in my body ♪
♪ Wanna see you move your body ♪
♪ Got this feeling in my body, come on ♪
Go, Queen Poppy! Way to go, Poppy!
She's my friend! I know her!
I know it's not officially hug time yet, but...
Now that I am queen, I decree that hug time is all the time.
translation.ko: 여왕으로서 명한다 이제부턴 항상 포옹 시간이다

translation.en: Yeah! Yeah! ♪ Got this feeling in my body ♪
♪ Got this feeling in my body, come on ♪
♪ Love was changing the minds of pretenders ♪
♪ In the key that our souls were singing ♪
♪ As we danced in the night ♪
♪ Remember how the stars stole the night away ♪
♪ Ba de ya Dancing in September ♪ ♪ Ba de ya Never was a cloudy day ♪
♪ Do you remember Never was a cloudy day, oh ♪
♪ And it never was a cloudy day ♪
